section.title: VoiceChecker Class Reference

para.para: Voice Check works in a walky talky manner. You press the grip button and it will transfer your voice to other player / clients in the network. You will not be able hear your own voice. Here you convert the voice to float and then to byte to send it on the network. Once the other non local player who receives it will do the reverse of it . There it will get converted from byte to float and then to Audio Clip

listitem.para: This methods is taking the byte voice data and converting into float and then to voice again using Audio.create
Send data for comvertion from byte to voice.
To send data from server to client

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Voice Check works in a walky talky manner. You press the grip button and it will transfer your voice to other player / clients in the network. You will not be able hear your own voice. Here you convert the voice to float and then to byte to send it on the network. Once the other non local player who receives it will do the reverse of it . There it will get converted from byte to float and then to Audio Clip
